name: UCMeTalk
overview:
UCMeTalk is a live social network where one-on-one video chats are facilitated between random university students at various college systems. UCMeTalk is a fun, unprecedented way to connect with new friends in the same university network.

At its core, UCMeTalk serves as a platform on which like-minded students around the world connect with one another within their college communities.

Video-based communication creates extraordinary opportunities for the development of both personal and professional long-lasting relationships, and UCMeTalk looks to nurture that potential. We aspire to empower students by giving them a tool with which they can expand their networks beyond the limitations of what is currently possible.
